item.title: Nasdaq rallies above 20,000 for the first time as tech shares gain: Live updates
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite rose Wednesday after November's inflation report met economists' projections.

item.title: European stocks close higher after U.S. inflation data comes in as expected; Zara owner Inditex falls 7%
item.description: European markets closed higher on Wednesday, as traders digested corporate updates and the latest U.S. inflation data.

item.title: Macy's employee who hid $151 million in delivery expenses was trying to mask initial mistake, sources say
item.description: The department store operator slightly raised its full-year forecast, while still projecting a sales decline.

item.title: Apple launches its ChatGPT integration with Siri
item.description: Apple released new versions of its iPhone, iPad, and Mac software on Wednesday that include the long-awaited ChatGPT integration with Siri.

item.title: NFL approves sale of minority stake in the Philadelphia Eagles at $8.3 billion value
item.description: The National Football league has approved the sale of a minority stake in the Philadelphia Eagles to two family investment groups.
